main event: An observer sighted four bright light objects on 17 Feb 1968 and one on 18 Feb 1968 in Miami, Florida.
interesting points: The objects were described as very much like balloons and were viewed from about 1000 yards away., Some of the objects emitted spark-like particles before burning out., The observation indicated that the sighting could relate to hot air balloons., The objects were reported at night, suggesting they appeared as bright lights against the dark sky., The report included specific details about movement and behavior of the sighted objects.
witness description: an individual who reported the sighting
